body:
Hi,

Thank you for your interest in Oracle Mobile and Chatbots. The links and information that you requested are below.   
•         Learn more about Mobile or Chatbots - https://bit.ly/chatbotlp
•         See what the experts are saying about our mobile strategy by reviewing the latest - https://bit.ly/mobilearep
•         New Imperatives for Business Mobile Application Strategies Whitepaper - https://bit.ly/mobilewhp
•         See how other customers have benefited from Chatbots - https://bit.ly/mobilerefs
•         Hear more about Chatbots - https://bit.ly/mobilevideoyt

Thank you,
Oracle team
